description: Upgrade plan to migrate project to latest LTS versions

tasks.description: Upgrade to Java 21 and Spring Boot 3.4
tasks.requirements: Upgrade JDK to 21, Spring Boot to 3.4, Spring Framework to 6.x, and migrate javax.* to jakarta.* if needed. Update all dependencies to compatible versions.
tasks.taskSummary: Successfully upgraded Java from 8 to 21, Spring Boot from 2.7.18 to 3.4.2, and Spring Framework to 6.x. Completed package migration from javax.* to jakarta.*. Build passing with all unit tests successful.
